mapper.select: select * from meeting_table where end = "진행" and hidden = "공개" order by ${sort_type} desc limit #{start}, #{end}
select count(*) from meeting_table where end = "진행" and hidden = "공개"
select count(*) from meeting_table where end = "진행" and hidden = "공개" and category = #{category}
select count(*) from meeting_table where user_id = #{user_id}
select count(*) from meeting_table where user_id = #{user_id} and category = #{category}
select count(*) from applicant_table where seq = #{seq}
select * from applicant_table where seq = #{seq} and user_id = #{user_id}
select count(*) from applicant_table where seq = #{seq} and user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.insert: insert into meeting_table(user_id, writer, title, contents, category, hidden, writing_time, hits, end, applicant_cnt, profile_url, contents_password) values(#{user_id}, #{writer}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{category}, #{hidden}, now(), 0, "진행", 0, #{profile_url}, #{contents_password})
insert into applicant_table(seq, user_id, contents, approval, applicant_time, name, profile_url) values(#{seq}, #{user_id}, #{contents}, #{approval}, now(), #{name}, #{profile_url})
